  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_41e8e68da94a4f845b080ec47d1b11e1e092e19b</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_41e8e68da94a4f845b080ec47d1b11e1e092e19b</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Angle of incidence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulo de incidência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Angolo dell'incidenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γωνία της πρόσπτωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ángulo de la incidencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show how the angle of incidence decides whether a light beam is refracted (left), refracted along the interface (centre) or reflected back (right) at an interface.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">index of refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">total internal reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen, wie der Einfallswinkel 
entscheidet, ob ein Lichtstrahl refracted (nach links), entlang der 
Schnittstelle (Mitte) refracted oder zurück (recht) an einer 
Schnittstelle reflektiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent comment l'angle 
d'incidence décide si un faisceau lumineux est réfracté (à 
gauche), réfracté le long de l'interface (centre) ou en 
arrière reflété (droit) à une interface.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram como o ângulo de 
incidência se decide se um feixe luminoso refracted (à esquerda), 
refracted ao longo da relação (centro) ou está refletido para trás
(direito) em uma relação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano come l'angolo 
dell'incidenza decide se un raggio di luce refracted (a sinistra), 
refracted lungo l'interfaccia (centro) o è riflesso indietro (di 
destra) ad un'interfaccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις επιδεικνύουν πώς η γωνία της 
πρόσπτωσης αποφασίζει εάν μια ελαφριά ακτίνα διαθλιέται 
(αριστερά), διαθλιέται κατά μήκος της διαπροσωπείας (κέντρο) ή 
απεικονίζεται πίσω (δεξιά) σε μια διαπροσωπεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran cómo el ángulo de 
la incidencia decide a si un rayo de luz está refractado (a la 
izquierda), refractado a lo largo del interfaz (centro) o reflejado 
detrás (derecho) en un interfaz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungskoeffizient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnittstellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungsindex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interne totalreflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">indice de réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">indice de réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion interne totale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamento predeterminado de refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">relações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamento predeterminado refractive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão interna total</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">indice di rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interfacce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">indice di rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione interna totale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ευρετήριο της διάθλασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαπροσωπείες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά διάθλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαθλαστικό ευρετήριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνολική εσωτερική αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">índice de refracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión ligera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refracción ligera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">índice de refracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión interna total</string>
          </keyword>
